SEARCH
Module it.polimi.ingsw.am07
Package it.polimi.ingsw.am07.client.gui.viewController

Class PlayerViewController

java.lang.Object
it.polimi.ingsw.am07.client.gui.viewController.PlayerViewController
public class PlayerViewController extends Object
Controller class for managing the player's view in the game GUI. This class handles updating UI components, user interactions, and game state rendering.

The view includes displaying player lists, resource counts, chat messages, decks, objectives, hand cards, and managing drag-and-drop functionality for placing cards.

Key functionalities include initializing the view, updating based on the client state, handling player clicks and confirm actions, managing drag-and-drop for card placement, rendering player game fields, and sending chat messages.

UI components managed include lists, text fields, text areas, buttons, labels, panes, and containers, integrating JavaFX components with game logic seamlessly.
